name: Connected Monitors
author: Lumbud84
description: Check off monitors based off of their colors, the number on their screens, amount and color of indicator lights, and connections to other monitors. All in a specific order.
notes: LUMBUD YOU ARE INSANE --Blan / You're welcome ;)  --Lumbud (Also, this will require a massive amount of modding experience, both in programming and modelling)
